channel.title: BattleScape - OSRS - Economy - Quests - 50+ Online! - Peaking 100+!
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GYb3Lds.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DP4mC9m.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/game/BattleScapeOS.jar][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iIChRj1.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/hiscores][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k0c7T6P.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/vote][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vvXf4CH.png[/img][/URL]
Normal mode provides x200 combat XP, x100 Prayer XP, x25 Slayer XP, and x15 skill XP. Cash bag drops scale with monster health and combat level, ranging from 50k to 150k. Drop rates are all 4x faster than RS, making items worth while but not too difficult either.
[video=youtube;4Ui15S1vK8U]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Ui15S1vK8U[/video]
[B][U]Minigames[/U][/B] Barrows Duel Arena Warriors Guild Pest Control Mage Arena TzHaar Fight Cave
[B][U]Quests[/U][/B] Dragon Slayer Lost City Recipe for Disaster Monkey Madness Desert Treasure Horror from the Deep Lunar Diplomacy
[B][U]Bosses[/U][/B] God Wars Dagannoth Kings King Black Dragon Corporeal Beast Chaos Elemental Wilderness Bosses Kalphite Queen
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/f4d65743dd71a1ad2b2b9a59f1ec0859.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NJKgJGW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OjUOiw2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0EGzCpP.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UBJgEL9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dAVOnoU.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w0TwiJh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YQvzMOw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/20ukRVT.png[/img] [/CENTER]

[CENTER]

Normal mode provides x200 combat XP, x100 Prayer XP, x25 Slayer XP, and x15 skill XP.
Cash bag drops scale with monster health and combat level, ranging from 50k to 150k.
Drop rates are all 4x faster than RS, making items worth while but not too difficult either.
